channel.title: Other Player Name
channel.description:
I am using this for a teleother spell and it shows the person that the spell was casted on name. sendQuest(""+playerName
So I tried +AttackingOn2.playerName but that didin't work either
So can someone help me. I need it to say the person that is using the spell's name
